sentences.en: ...a CD of vocal and instrumental music.
As baseball commissioner, Chandler was instrumental in making Jackie Robinson the first black player in the major leagues.
sentences.cn: 杰基·罗宾逊成为职业棒球联赛中首位黑人选手，作为棒球协会总干事的钱德勒功不可没。

sentences.en: Earthworms may be instrumental in dispersing fungi or bacteria.
sentences.cn: 蚯蚓可能是散布真菌及细菌的工具.

sentences.en: He composed both vocal and instrumental music.
sentences.cn: 他既谱写声乐曲也谱写器乐曲.

sentences.en: He was instrumental in bringing about an end to the conflict.
sentences.cn: 他在终止冲突的过程中起了重要作用。

sentences.en: He was instrumental in catching the criminal.
sentences.cn: 在捉拿那个罪犯的过程中,他起了作用.

sentences.en: He was instrumental in developing links with European organizations.
sentences.cn: 他在建立与欧洲各组织之间的联系中起了重要作用。

sentences.en: Her help was instrumental in tracking down the criminal.
sentences.cn: 她的协助对追捕到罪犯起了相当作用.

sentences.en: In his first years as chairman he was instrumental in raising the company's wider profile.
sentences.cn: 他任董事长的最初几年为提升公司的知名度起到了积极的推动作用。

sentences.en: In Polish the verb'to be'takes the instrumental case.
sentences.cn: 在波兰语中,动词tobe用工具格.
这是一部可以用乐器演奏的作品.

sentences.en: Jesse Jackson was instrumental in the release of some of the hostages.
sentences.cn: 其中一些人质得以获释多亏了杰西·杰克逊。

sentences.en: Technical innovation is instrumental in improving the qualities of products.
sentences.cn: 技术革新有助于提高产品的质量.

sentences.en: The isoseismal maps are valuable complements to the instrumental records.
sentences.cn: 等震线图是仪器记录有价值的补充资料.

sentences.en: The last track on the CD is an instrumental.
sentences.cn: CD上的最后一支曲目是一首器乐曲。

sentences.en: These tests require an extremely sophisticated instrumental effort.
sentences.cn: 这些试验需要极其尖端仪器才能办到.

sentences.en: We had been instrumental in all these negotiations.
sentences.cn: 在所有这些谈判中,我们一直是大力协助的.

words.tran_cn: 仪器；工具；乐器；手段；器械
工具主义者；乐器演奏家
使用仪器；乐器法；仪表化
乐器的；有帮助的；仪器的，器械的

trans.tran_cn: 乐器的，仪器的，有帮助的，起作用的
trans.tran_en: made by or for musical instruments
a piece of music in which no voices are used, only instruments
